event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Use <tt>fmdump -v -u <EVENT-ID></tt> to identify the repaired components.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: All faults associated with an event id have been addressed.
event_registry_properties.name: detail
event_registry_properties.item: All faults associated with an event id have been addressed.
event_registry_properties.name: details
impact
event_registry_properties.item: Performance degradation of the system due to the original fault may have been recovered.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: Some system components offlined because of the original fault may have been brought back online.
